title: Dr. Stone: Stone Wars - Kaisen Zenya Special Eizou
alternative_title: Dr. Stone: Stone Wars Eve of the Battle Special Feature, Dr.STONE STONE WARS 開戦前夜スペシャル映像, Dr. Stone: Stone Wars Episode Zero, Dr. Stone: Stone Wars Episode 0
